front.title: CDNI delegation using Automated Certificate Management Environment

abstract.t: This document defines metadata to support delegating the delivery of HTTPS content between two or more interconnected Content Delivery Networks (CDNs). Specifically, this document defines a Content Delivery Network Interconnection (CDNI) Metadata interface object to enable delegation of X.509 certificates leveraging delegation schemes defined in RFC9115. RFC9115 allows delegating entities to remain in full control of the delegation and be able to revoke it any time and this avoids the need to share private cryptographic key material between the involved entities.
